SLogo.View.Sprite

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • SLogo.View.Sprite.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Sprite object used by CanvasView to be able to keep track of Turtles (and their properties0 on the front end
